sentences.sContent: ObjectiveTo search for a new method for urethra reconstruction using autologous buccal mucosal graft while lacking of local skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: ObjectiveTo search for a new method for urethra reconstruction using autologous buccal mucosal graft while lacking of local skin.
sentences.sCn: 目的探讨采用口腔粘膜游离移植，对局部缺乏组织的尿道下裂行尿道再造的方法。

sentences.sContent: The flaming crimson butterfly quietly perched on a happy face, accounted for a large and buccal, true to life likeness, as if to flying, abnormalities of the enchanting dazzling.
sentences.sContent_eng: The flaming crimson butterfly quietly perched on a happy face, accounted for a large and buccal, true to life likeness, as if to flying, abnormalities of the enchanting dazzling.
sentences.sCn: 那只火焰般赤红的蝴蝶安静地栖息在欢喜的脸上，占了大片又颊，栩栩如生，仿佛就要展翅而飞，异常的妖娆耀眼。

trans.tranCn: (面)颊的, 口的, 口腔的
trans.tranOther: of or relating to the cheek
